Class com.bastel.democomp.DemoComputer

                                   |
                                   +----com.bastel.democomp.DemoComputer
public class DemoComputer
extends Applet
implements Component
Main Demo-Computer Class. This Class constructs all necessary components and links them together.

DemoComputer()

addListener(Component)
Method empty since we do not allow components to register with us
broadcast(Word, int)
void
crash(String)
This method may be called by the CPU component of the DemoComputer to signal, that the CPU has crashed
destroy()
Destroys the DemoComputer, freeing all components

Copies the main background image to our image buffer as soon as the image is fully loaded
